settings.title:
Your home is your safe space.

Our products help you keep it that way.
Just because something smells good doesn’t mean it isn’t bad.
settings.description: In the US, companies aren’t required to disclose the ingredients they use in fragrance formulas. That means that potentially harmful chemicals are often hiding in plain sight—like these common air care ingredients:

settings.title: The EU has banned over 1,700 cosmetic ingredients. The US? Just 11.⁽¹⁾
We’re raising the standards for air care, so you never have to compromise yours.
Effective
settings.description: We put in hundreds of hours of research, worked with multiple formulators, and tested dozens of iterations until we were satisfied that our products would work without covering anything up—odors or ingredients.

settings.title: Safe
settings.description: Our products are the first air care products certified by the Clean Label Project and are formulated with non-toxic ingredients. They’re also Safe Scent-certified—a new standard for air care products that we’re pioneering.

settings.title: Enveloping
settings.description: We partnered with a Swiss fragrance house that has over 125 years of experience to craft scents that enhance your everyday routine. After countless rounds of testing, we've developed the most transportive scents for you to use in your home.

settings.title: It started when I found a lump in my breast.
settings.description:
I started researching the carcinogens that my doctor had asked me about, and was shocked to  learn that not only are they a common ingredient in anything in fragrance (and these days, that’s pretty much everything)—including the air care products I used every day. And because companies aren’t required to disclose them on the label, they’re pretty much impossible to avoid.

When I couldn’t find any alternative air care products that were safe, effective, and smelled great, I decided to create Realm: so everyone can care for their space without compromise and we can set the New Standard for Air Care.

-Ashley Sweeney, Founder
